contents:
第一句的 without any rest 可以换成 without changing the shoulder 来突显某人的肩膀很有力。

第五句可作 The Chinese economy is not a little pond anymore, the "Crazy Universe" may upset a little pond, but never a immense ocean, without it, the ocean will not be longer ocean.

第六句的后半句改为 Every time I see it, I feel President Xi's warm is inside my body. 跟吼。

最后一句不够精甚，个人更加喜欢 I make my face to spilt shit. 

乳包雅思8，5肯定是没的啦，大概8吧。
